DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Survey Shows Baby_Boomers Seeking Security : More_than 70 % of Americans say the would sacrifice new cars , brand name goods and going_out to restaurants to ensure a financially secure retirement , according to a recent survey . More_than 60 % of baby_boomers -- Americans between the ages 29 and 47 -- say they will not have enough for retirement no matter how much they save , according to a report commissioned by the Municipal Bond Investors Assurance Corp . About 66 % of baby_boomers say they believe their retirement savings are at risk .
